INTRO_TEXT: I am a passionate software engineering student at the Faculty of Science Tunis (FST) with a strong foundation in problem-solving and a keen interest in web development. In my first year, I achieved an excellent average. With a focus on software development, I have successfully completed several projects, including a web redesign, library management software, a full-stack web application for hotel management, a 2D platform game, a program for creating encrypted QR codes, and an AWS cloud solution for hosting 3-tier web apps. These experiences have equipped me with a diverse skill set in Java, JavaScript, Python, and C#, as well as experience with services like AWS and frameworks like Angular, React and Spring Boot. With a dedication to continuous growth, I actively participate in sports and programming-related online courses. I am driven to seek new challenges, expand my knowledge, and contribute to the field of software engineering.
NGSIGN_DESCRIPTION: Developed a SSL Certificate Management web platform that allows users to upload, store, renew their different SSL certificates as well as link them to their organisation's departments for easier management.
SUMMER_INTERNSHIP_AT_UIB: SUMMER INTERNSHIP AT INTERNATIONALE DE BANQUES (UIB)
UIB_DESCRIPTION: Developed the 'D&PO Visual Management' application focusing on data visualization and simplifying data and project management
FST_SINCE_2022: Faculty of Sciences of Tunis Since 2022
